input_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_3 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_4 = bw.wire.Wire()
parity_bit = bw.wire.Wire()
error = bw.wire.Wire()
input_bus = bw.wire.Bus4(input_1, input_2, input_3, input_4)
a = bw.logic.ParityChecker4(input_bus, parity_bit, error)
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 0
parity_bit.value = 0
assert error.value == 0
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 0
parity_bit.value = 1
assert error.value == 1

input_1.value = 1

input_4.value = 1
parity_bit.value = 1
assert error.value == 1
print(a.__doc__)
print(a)
a(input_bus=(0, 1, 1, 1), parity_bit=0, error=None)
assert error.value == 1
